channel.title: Coding Tips?
channel.description: Hey all I would like to add to my server. For V4 and i need some help. Well i'm out of idea's so can i have some help?

item.title: Coding Tips?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("train2")) { teleportToX = 2892; teleportToY = 9694; }

That is a sick place and i put bunch of stuff there in case the regular training area gets too filled up, just add whatever u would like there, it is pretty fun, but beware it is wildy, so if u don’t want it to be just open up your nonwild thingy and put it in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding Tips?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1037){ npcId = 1835; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419){ npcId = 2862; isNpc = true; playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

That will make it so if u wearing bunny ears u become bunny, and if u wearing scythe u become scythe and fly around as if u doing ::god command, hope you don’t have it yet

Read full topic
